clause.title: Reserved attributes
clause.paragraph: A small number of attributes affect the language in some way. These attributes include: System.AttributeUsageAttribute (24.4.1), which is used to describe the ways in which an attribute class can be used. System.ConditionalAttribute (24.4.2), which is used to define conditional methods. System.ObsoleteAttribute (24.4.3), which is used to mark a member as obsolete.
